0110001001100111 0011101101010011 0 -> sum: 1001110110111010, cout: 0
0011001111011000 0010110101001010 1 -> sum: 0110000100100011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
